SEARCH
Package net.sf.opendse.optimization

Class VariableClassOrder

java.lang.Object
net.sf.opendse.optimization.VariableClassOrder
public class VariableClassOrder extends Object
The VariableClassOrder contains variable classes which are explored by the genetic algorithm during the design space exploration. The order of the variable classes defines in which order the corresponding variables are set by the SAT solver during the decoding of the SAT genotype.

Only variables assignable from classes found in the VariableClassOrder are used by the genetic algorithm. The assignment of variables which are not assignable from the classes in the VariableClassOrder (in this case, the indexOf() method returns -1) is not explored, but instead chosen solely by the SAT-solver.

During the SAT-solving, variables that are assignable from classes with a lower index in the VariableClassOrder are set before variables with a higher index, while variables which are not assignable at all are set at the very end.

    VariableClassOrder()
    In the default case, the Object class is the only entry of the VariableClassOrder.

  • Constructor Details

    • VariableClassOrder

      @Inject public VariableClassOrder()
      In the default case, the Object class is the only entry of the VariableClassOrder. Consequently,
      a) all variables are explored by the genetic algorithm and
      b) no fix order is specified for setting the variables by the SAT-solver.

  • Method Details

    • getOrderSize

      public int getOrderSize()
      Returns the number of the list entries in the order list.
      Returns:
      Number of classes in the order list.

    • indexOf

      public int indexOf(Object object)
      Returns the lowest index of a class from which the given object is assignable. Returns a -1 if the given object is not assignable from any of the classes that can be found in the order list.
      Parameters:
      object -
      Returns:
      lowest index that is assignable or -1 if not assignable

    • add

      public void add(Class<?> variableClass, Class<?>... beforeVariableClasses)
      Add the given variable class to the variable order. (Optional:) Provide this variable with a lower index than the provided variables classes. All variable classes that are not assignable from the VariableClassOrder after this operation are ignored, i.e., they are not part of the SAT-genotype and are set after all non-ignored variables by the SAT-solver.
      Parameters:
      variableClass - The variable class that is added to the variable order
      beforeVariableClasses - (optional) The variable classes that should have a higher list index than the variableClass and should be set after variableClass
